answerText: Saul Bellow[10] This other novel by Bellow describes the journey of Eugene, the title character, through Africa, during which he moves a statue of the goddess Mummah and becomes a spiritual leader of the Wariri.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 4 | 15 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote about a failing writer who tries to regain custody of his daughter Junie. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Jewish author of Herzog and The Adventures of Augie March.
